en-US.name: Jellyfin Player
en-US.summary: Play media from your Jellyfin server
examplePhrases: Alexa ask Jellyfin Player play my favorite music
Alexa ask Jellyfin Player play songs from 'Artist'
Alexa ask Jellyfin Player play my playlist 'Best Music'
en-US.description:
Play media from your Jellyfin server.

Source: https://github.com/infinityofspace/jellyfin_alexa_skill

de-DE.name: Jellyfin Player
de-DE.summary: Spiele Medien von deinem Jellyfin Server
examplePhrases: Alexa sage Jellyfin Player spiele meine Lieblingsmusik
Alexa sage Jellyfin Player spiele Songs von 'Interpret'
Alexa sage Jellyfin Player spiele meine Playlist 'Beste Musik'
de-DE.description:
Spiele Medien von deinem Jellyfin Server.

Quellcode: https://github.com/infinityofspace/jellyfin_alexa_skill

it-IT.name: Jellyfin Player
it-IT.summary: Riproduci media dalla tuo Server Jellyfin
examplePhrases: Alexa chiedi a Jellyfin di riprodurre la mia musica
Alexa chiedi a Jellyfin di riprodurre la mia canzoni di 'Artist'
Alexa chiedi a Jellyfin di riprodurre la playlist 'Musica Migliore'
it-IT.description:
Riproduci media dal tuo Server Jellyfin.

Source: https://github.com/infinityofspace/jellyfin_alexa_skill
